name: Netafim Drippers and Driplines
shortDescription: Drippers, driplines and other emitters types for any crop, topography, climate, soil, anywhere.
description: Drip irrigation is transforming the lives of millions of farmers around the world enabling higher yields while saving on water, fertilizer and energy.

features.title: Universal Compatibility
features.description: Suitable for any crop, topography, climate, and soil type

features.title: Resource Efficiency
features.description: Significant savings in water, fertilizer, and energy usage
